verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> shewed <S%G5319><s%> <S%G5656><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to the Talmidim <S%G3101><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> of Tiberias <S%G5085><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> on this wise <S%G3779><s%> shewed <S%G5319><s%> <S%G5656><s%> he himself.

There were <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> together <S%G3674><s%> SHim`on <S%G4613><s%> Kefa <S%G4074><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Thomas <S%G2381><s%> called <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5746><s%> Didymus <S%G1324><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Natan'el <S%G3482><s%> of <S%G575><s%> Kanah <S%G2580><s%> in the Galil <S%G1056><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the sons <S%G3588><s%> of Zavdai <S%G2199><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> other <S%G243><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%>.

SHim`on <S%G4613><s%> Kefa <S%G4074><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, I go <S%G5217><s%> <S%G5719><s%> a fishing <S%G232><s%> <S%G5721><s%>. They say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, We <S%G2249><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> go <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5736><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>. They went forth <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> entered <S%G305><s%> <S%G5627><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a ship <S%G4143><s%> immediately <S%G2117><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1565><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> they caught <S%G4084><s%> <S%G5656><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> when the morning <S%G4405><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> come <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5637><s%>, Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> <S%G5627><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the shore <S%G123><s%>: but <S%G3305><s%> the Talmidim <S%G3101><s%> knew <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5715><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it was <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>.

Then <S%G3767><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Children <S%G3813><s%>, have ye <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> any <S%G3387><s%> meat <S%G4371><s%>? They answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5662><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, No <S%G3756><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Cast <S%G906><s%> <S%G5628><s%> the net <S%G1350><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the right <S%G1188><s%> side <S%G3313><s%> of the ship <S%G4143><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ye shall find <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5692><s%>. They cast <S%G906><s%> <S%G5627><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> now <S%G3765><s%> they were <S%G2480><s%> not <S%G3765><s%> able <S%G2480><s%> <S%G5656><s%> to draw <S%G1670><s%> <S%G5658><s%> it <S%G846><s%> for <S%G575><s%> the multitude <S%G4128><s%> of fishes <S%G2486><s%>.

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> Talmid <S%G3101><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> <S%G5707><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto Kefa <S%G4074><s%>, It is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%>. Now <S%G3767><s%> when SHim`on <S%G4613><s%> Kefa <S%G4074><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5660><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it was <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%>, he girt <S%G1241><s%> <S%G5668><s%> his fisher's coat <S%G1903><s%> unto him, (for <S%G1063><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> naked <S%G1131><s%>,) and <S%G2532><s%> did cast <S%G906><s%> <S%G5627><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the other <S%G243><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5627><s%> in a little ship <S%G4142><s%>; (for <S%G1063><s%> they were <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> far <S%G3112><s%> from <S%G575><s%> land <S%G1093><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> as it were <S%G5613><s%> <S%G575><s%> two hundred <S%G1250><s%> cubits <S%G4083><s%>,) dragging <S%G4951><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the net <S%G1350><s%> with fishes <S%G2486><s%>.

As soon <S%G5613><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> as they were come <S%G576><s%> <S%G5627><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> land <S%G1093><s%>, they saw <S%G991><s%> <S%G5719><s%> a fire of coals <S%G439><s%> there, and <S%G2532><s%> fish <S%G3795><s%> laid <S%G2749><s%> <S%G5740><s%> thereon <S%G1945><s%> <S%G5740><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> bread <S%G740><s%>.

Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Bring <S%G5342><s%> <S%G5657><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the fish <S%G3795><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> ye have <S%G4084><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> caught <S%G4084><s%> <S%G5656><s%>.

SHim`on <S%G4613><s%> Kefa <S%G4074><s%> went up <S%G305><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> drew <S%G1670><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the net <S%G1350><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> land <S%G1093><s%> full <S%G3324><s%> of great <S%G3173><s%> fishes <S%G2486><s%>, an hundred <S%G1540><s%> and fifty <S%G4004><s%> and three <S%G5140><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> for all there were so many <S%G5118><s%>, yet was <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the net <S%G1350><s%> broken <S%G4977><s%> <S%G5681><s%>.

Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5736><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> taketh <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5719><s%> bread <S%G740><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> giveth <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5719><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> fish <S%G3795><s%> likewise <S%G3668><s%>.

This <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G5319><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> the third time <S%G5154><s%> that Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> shewed himself <S%G5319><s%> <S%G5681><s%> to his <S%G846><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%>, after that he was risen <S%G1453><s%> <S%G5685><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>.

So <S%G3767><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> they had dined <S%G709><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> to SHim`on <S%G4613><s%> Kefa <S%G4074><s%>, SHim`on <S%G4613><s%>, son of Jonas <S%G2495><s%>, lovest thou <S%G25><s%> <S%G5719><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> more than <S%G4119><s%> these <S%G5130><s%>? He saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Yea <S%G3483><s%>, YY <S%G2962><s%>; thou <S%G4771><s%> knowest <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I love <S%G5368><s%> <S%G5719><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>. He saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Feed <S%G1006><s%> <S%G5720><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> lambs <S%G721><s%>.

He saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> the second time <S%G1208><s%>, SHim`on <S%G4613><s%>, son of Jonas <S%G2495><s%>, lovest thou <S%G25><s%> <S%G5719><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>? He saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Yea <S%G3483><s%>, YY <S%G2962><s%>; thou <S%G4771><s%> knowest <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I love <S%G5368><s%> <S%G5719><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>. He saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Feed <S%G4165><s%> <S%G5720><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%>.

He saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> time, SHim`on <S%G4613><s%>, son of Jonas <S%G2495><s%>, lovest <S%G5368><s%> <S%G5719><s%> thou me <S%G3165><s%>? Kefa <S%G4074><s%> was grieved <S%G3076><s%> <S%G5681><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> time, Lovest <S%G5368><s%> <S%G5719><s%> thou me <S%G3165><s%>? And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, YY <S%G2962><s%>, thou <S%G4771><s%> knowest <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>; thou <S%G4771><s%> knowest <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5719><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I love <S%G5368><s%> <S%G5719><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>. Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Feed <S%G1006><s%> <S%G5720><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%>.

Verily <S%G281><s%>, verily <S%G281><s%>, I say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%>, When <S%G3753><s%> thou wast <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> young <S%G3501><s%>, thou girdedst <S%G2224><s%> <S%G5707><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> walkedst <S%G4043><s%> <S%G5707><s%> whither <S%G3699><s%> thou wouldest <S%G2309><s%> <S%G5707><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> thou shalt be old <S%G1095><s%> <S%G5661><s%>, thou shalt stretch forth <S%G1614><s%> <S%G5692><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> another <S%G243><s%> shall gird <S%G2224><s%> <S%G5692><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> carry <S%G5342><s%> <S%G5692><s%> thee whither <S%G3699><s%> thou wouldest <S%G2309><s%> <S%G5719><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>.

<S%G1161><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> spake he <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, signifying <S%G4591><s%> <S%G5723><s%> by what <S%G4169><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> he should glorify <S%G1392><s%> <S%G5692><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> when he had spoken <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5631><s%> this <S%G5124><s%>, he saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Follow <S%G190><s%> <S%G5720><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> Kefa <S%G4074><s%>, turning about <S%G1994><s%> <S%G5651><s%>, seeth <S%G991><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the Talmid <S%G3101><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> <S%G5707><s%> following <S%G190><s%> <S%G5723><s%>; which <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> leaned <S%G377><s%> <S%G5627><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> breast <S%G4738><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> supper <S%G1173><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, YY <S%G2962><s%>, which <S%G5101><s%> is he <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> that betrayeth <S%G3860><s%> <S%G5723><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>?

Kefa <S%G4074><s%> seeing <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5631><s%> him <S%G5126><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> to Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>, YY <S%G2962><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> shall this man <S%G3778><s%> do ?

Then <S%G3767><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%> abroad <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5627><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> Talmid <S%G3101><s%> should <S%G599><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> die <S%G599><s%> <S%G5719><s%>: yet <S%G2532><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, <S%G3754><s%> He shall <S%G599><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> die <S%G599><s%> <S%G5719><s%>; but <S%G235><s%>, If <S%G1437><s%> I will <S%G2309><s%> <S%G5725><s%> that he <S%G846><s%> tarry <S%G3306><s%> <S%G5721><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> I come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5736><s%>, what <S%G5101><s%> is that to <S%G4314><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>?

This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the Talmid <S%G3101><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> testifieth <S%G3140><s%> <S%G5723><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> these things <S%G5130><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> wrote <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5660><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> his <S%G846><s%> testimony <S%G3141><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> true <S%G227><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> there are <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> other things <S%G243><s%> which <S%G3745><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, the which <S%G3748><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> they should be written <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5747><s%> every <S%G2596><s%> one <S%G1520><s%>, I suppose <S%G3633><s%> <S%G5736><s%> that even <S%G3761><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> itself <S%G846><s%> could not <S%G3761><s%> contain <S%G5562><s%> <S%G5658><s%> the books <S%G975><s%> that should be written <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5746><s%>. Amen <S%G281><s%>.
